meanings.definition: Slightly fat or chubby in a pleasant way.
meanings.sent1: The puppy looked podgier after a hearty meal.
meanings.sent2: She felt podgier after indulging in her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear looked even podgier wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky seemed podgier as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The smile on her face made her cheeks look even podgier.

meanings.sent1: His cat appeared podgier after being pampered with treats.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel seemed podgier as it stored more nuts for winter.
meanings.sent3: The balloon looked podgier as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent4: The river appeared podgier after heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The tree trunk looked podgier with each passing year.
